title: Two Steps From Hell - Colin Frake On Fire Mountain
description:
Colin Frake on Fire Mountain is a soundtrack release featuring music from the enhanced E-book of the same name. It features 14 tracks composed by Thomas Bergersen and Nick Phoenix and represents the seventh public album released under the Two Steps from Hell label.
The E-book release comprises a 75,000-word fantasy novel written by Nick Phoenix accompanied by forty-six illustrations from Otto Bjornik, in addition to the music featured on the soundtrack. It is intended as the first in an ongoing series and is currently available only through iBooks.
